text: @NYGovCuomo Yes the #Coronavirus pandemic...is STILL going on?🤷🏾‍♀️YES there's no vaccine?YET&STILL even though?It is a NEW NORMAL?🔄Life STILL needs to go on & TRUST ME!If people can CONTINUE 2 do what we doing?✅We will be as Mary J. Blige would say #JustFine!👌🏾
